name: The Entitsy
description:
Well... You consider yourself as a brave Beast Hunter and came here to send one of the demons to the hell, but... Was peace never an option really?  

The Game is consist of Main part and Insane mode which is unlocked by finishing former one, in Insane Mode you can compare your finishing time with your friends, with increased speed.  The Enemy AI can be quirky sometimes.

Also put an enormous easter egg and small nice detail which can be noticed easily if you completed the game several times.

Everything beside, this is my first game and I tried my best. All I wanna say is  people who starts their career as a Game Developer, maan.. You are gonna face lots of challenges, sometimes you can even feel heavily frustrated, however, once you finished the game You are gonna filled with satisfaction.  Even I had to restart the project several times which really devastated me.... But ultimately I frickin did it! If I did this who is not professional, you sure can do my friend. Just believe in yourself.

Good Luck!!!
